# React Skills

Skills for React development and code review.

## Available Skills

| Skill | Description |
|-------|-------------|
| `react:component-review` | Review React components for best practices |
| `react:refactor-hooks` | Refactor class components to hooks |

## Usage

```bash
# Review a component
doyaken skill react:component-review --file=src/components/Button.tsx

# Refactor to hooks
doyaken skill react:refactor-hooks --file=src/components/Form.tsx
```
